lead_paragraph: WEINBERG--Harvey, 64. Camp Oxford, outside of Norwich, New York, lost its greatest champion and the New York Giants lost a huge fan. Harvey was a great guy, never quite appreciating how good he was...a wonderful father to Stephanie and Taylor and a loyal and terrific friend. For the past seven years, he worked in the Commercial Lending Division at The Dime Savings Bank of Williamsburgh. He loved his co-workers there and they loved and appreciated him. He was happy there. Those who loved him can't believe he's gone. Jane and Michael Groothuis 1/3
